data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Trinity Palmetto Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trinity Palmetto Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Trinity Palmetto Point to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Trinity Palmetto Point. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Trinity Palmetto Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Trinity
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Trinity, Trinity Palmetto Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Trinity Palmetto Point.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Trinity Palmetto Point words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.focus_label: Trinity Palmetto Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Trinity Palmetto Point to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Trinity Palmetto Point
location.full_name: Trinity Palmetto Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis
